scripts.download: mkdir -p mongodb logs db && curl -o mongodb/gene_info.bson http://www.ppmi.io/gene_info.bson && curl -o mongodb/gene_info.metadata.json http://www.ppmi.io/gene_info.metadata.json
scripts.mongodb: mkdir -p logs db && mongod --port 27017 --dbpath db --logpath logs/mongodb.log --fork
